name: cms-platform
description: CMS Platform - Admin CMS + Public Catalog API + Scheduled Publishing

scripts.dev:
docker compose up --build -d && sleep 5 && npm run setup && echo '
✅ Services ready!' && docker compose logs -f
scripts.dev:fresh:
docker compose down -v && docker compose up --build -d && sleep 8 && npm run migrate && npm run seed && echo '
✅ Fresh start complete!' && docker compose logs -f
scripts.setup: npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.start: docker compose up -d && docker compose logs -f
scripts.migrate: docker compose exec api node run-migrations.js
scripts.seed: docker compose exec api node run-seed.js
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db && sleep 5 && npm run migrate && npm run seed
